metadata.title: Janet C. Mangini v. R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Company Et Al.; J. Douglas Weber Deposition; Tape 1 of 5 [Parts 1-4]
metadata.description: Deposition of John Douglas Weber, Director of Marketing Research, in the case of Mangini v. R.J. Reynolds Company. Testimony covers Weber's career at RJR and marketing research methods used by the cigarette company. Click Here to View Part 1 Click Here to View Part 2 Click Here to View Part 3 Click Here to View Part 4
